name: The Lost Books!
description:
The Story And Lore!

This is about a young mage apprentice that was looking after her masters house but it got robbed! and now she has to find the books in the forest and dodge those nasty monsters!

----------------------------------------

Controls!

To Move Left And Right - A & D Or Arrow Key's

To jump - Press the space bar to jump and press it in mid air to jump two times

----------------------------------------

Secrets! 

There are some secrets and easter eggs that i have hidden in the game that are little hard to find but who doesn't like some good hard hidden content right? 

----------------------------------------

The Next Steps Of This Game!

I don't know how much more will be added to this game but i might add more hidden levels and easter eggs in the future and if i feel like it then i might add even more things 

----------------------------------------

Who made this!?!

I made everything in this game (art/music/sound) and hope i can get even better at all those things, And thanks for downloading the game and playing it!

----------------------------------------
